items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Enable team members to see task status changes instantly across all devices.
acceptance_criteria: When a task is updated by a user, all other team members see the change within 2 seconds.
Task status, assignee, and due date changes are reflected without manual refresh.
non_functional: System should handle at least 500 concurrent users without performance degradation.
Updates should propagate with latency under 2 seconds.

items.title: Shared Project Boards
items.description: Allow teams to create and manage shared boards for organizing tasks.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create a board and invite team members via email.
All invited members can add, edit, and delete tasks on the board.
non_functional: Board loading time should be under 1 second for up to 100 tasks.
Access control must prevent unauthorized users from viewing or editing boards.

notes: Assumed core features include real-time updates and shared boards as part of team collaboration. Further clarification needed on integrations, mobile support, and offline capabilities.
